product_name: FCS GlassFlex GX Paddleboard Side Fins - Set of 2
long_description: Replacement side fins for a 2+1 fin setup on your paddleboard, the set of 2 FCS GlassFlex GX Paddleboard Side Fins enhances tracking. Compatible with any FCS I and II fin systems (common on any paddleboard which uses a multiple fin setup).
short_description: Replacement side fins for a 2+1 fin setup on your paddleboard, the set of 2 FCS GlassFlex GX Paddleboard Side Fins enhances tracking.
